cast.overview: Boxer "Irish" Micky Ward's unlikely road to the world light welterweight title. His Rocky-like rise was shepherded by half-brother Dicky, a boxer-turned-trainer who rebounded in life after nearly being KO'd by drugs and crime.
cast.title: The Fighter

cast.overview: Susan, a single mother of two, works as a waitress in a small town. Her son, Henry, is an 11-year-old genius who not only manages the family finances but acts as emotional support for his mother and younger brother. When Henry discovers that the girl next door has a terrible secret, he implores Susan to take matters into her own hands.
cast.title: The Book of Henry

details.biography:
Jackson Nicoll is an American child actor, best known for portraying Billy, the grandson of the title character, in Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa (2013).

Nicoll is from Seabrook, New Hampshire. His other credits include The Fighter (2010), What's Your Number? (2011), and Fun Size (2012).
details.name: Jackson Nicoll
